highlights: Architected a full-stack authentication system using Express.js, React, and MongoDB, implementing end-to-end signup, login, logout, and session management with JWT access and refresh tokens.
Implemented secure credential handling with bcrypt password hashing, server-side input validation, and middleware-based route protection on both backend APIs and frontend routes.
Integrated token lifecycle management with HTTP-only cookies and automatic refresh flows, ensuring persistent and secure user sessions across page reloads.
Designed a modular frontend architecture using React, Redux Toolkit, and React Router to centralize user state, authentication logic, and protected navigation flows.
